Key Match Events: Florian Wirtz scored the opening goal for Germany
Jamal Musiala scored Germany's second goal
Kai Havertz scored a penalty to make it 3-0 for Germany
Ryan Porteous was sent off for a two-footed challenge on Ilkay Gündogan
Niclas Füllkrug scored Germany's fourth goal
Post-Match Reflections: Steve Clarke expressed frustration over Scotland's poor start
Germany players celebrated their opening win in style
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Munich Football Arena was filled with Scottish fans
The game was played on a white Uefa vinyl flooring
Others: Germany dominated the first half of the match
Scotland pulled one back via an own goal by Antonio Rüdiger
Emre Can scored a fifth goal for Germany in stoppage time
